name: tfjs-basic-chrome-extension
description: Use tfjs model.predict in a chrome extension

scripts.clean-dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/src
scripts.clean-copy: npm run clean-dist && npm run copy-images && npm run copy-libs
scripts.copy-libs: cp src/content.js dist/src/ && cp src/imagenet_classes.js dist/src/
scripts.build: npm run clean-copy && parcel build src/background.js -d dist/src/ -o background --no-minify
scripts.watch: npm run clean-copy && parcel watch src/background.js --hmr-hostname localhost -d dist/src/ -o background
